DOC.brief_summary: Student Investigator = Thakkallapalli Zeeshan Muzahid . The study aim assess prevalence prehypertension among medical student Andhra Medical College , Visakhapatnam , India association cardiovascular risk factor - overweight /obesity , diabetes , lipid profile .
DOC.brief_title: Prehypertension Among Medical Students Visakhapatnam Association With Cardiovascular Risk Factors
DOC.detailed_description: 275 medical student study history take examination do special emphasis record Blood Pressure , measurement height weight ( & Body Mass Index ) Waist Circumference . Glucose Tolerance Test Fasting Lipid profile measure random selection 30 prehypertensives 30 normotensives .
DOC.criteria: Medical Students study MBBS ( Bachelor Medicine & Bachelor Surgery ) Andhra Medical College clinically healthy consent participate study know cardiovascular disease know hypertension use antihypertensive cardiovascular drug use drug affect BP , weight , Blood sugar
